verses.verse: Peter<WG4074>, an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, to the strangers<WG3927> scattered<WG1290> throughout Pontus<WG4195>, Galatia<WG1053>, Cappadocia<WG2587>, Asia<WG773>, and<WG2532> Bithynia<WG978>,

Elect<WG1588> according<WG2596> to the foreknowledge<WG4268> of God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962>, through<WG1722> sanctification<WG38> of the Spirit<WG4151>, unto<WG1519> obedience<WG5218> and<WG2532> sprinkling<WG4473> of the blood<WG129> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>: Grace<WG5485> unto you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, be multiplied<WG4129>.

Blessed<WG2128> be the God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, which<WG3588> according to<WG2596> his<WG846> abundant<WG4183> mercy<WG1656> hath begotten<WG313> us<WG2248> again<WG313> unto<WG1519> a lively<WG2198> hope<WG1680> by<WG1223> the resurrection<WG386> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, abundant: Gr. much

To<WG1519> an inheritance<WG2817> incorruptible<WG862>, and<WG2532> undefiled<WG283>, and<WG2532> that fadeth not away<WG263>, reserved<WG5083> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> for<WG1519> you<WG5209>, for you: or, for us

Who<WG3588> are kept<WG5432> by<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> unto<WG1519> salvation<WG4991> ready<WG2092> to be revealed<WG601> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> time<WG2540>.

Wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> ye greatly rejoice<WG21>, though now<WG737> for a season<WG3641>, if<WG1487> need<WG1163> be<WG2076>, ye are in heaviness<WG3076> through<WG1722> manifold<WG4164> temptations<WG3986>:

That<WG2443> the trial<WG1383> of your<WG5216> faith<WG4102>, being much<WG4183> more precious<WG5093> than of gold<WG5553> that perisheth<WG622>, though<WG1223> <WG1161> it be tried<WG1381> with fire<WG4442>, might be found<WG2147> unto<WG1519> praise<WG1868> and<WG2532> honour<WG5092> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> at<WG1722> the appearing<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>:

Whom<WG3739> having<WG1492> not<WG3756> seen<WG1492> <WG1492>, ye love<WG25>; in<WG1519> whom<WG3739>, though now<WG737> ye see<WG3708> him not<WG3361>, yet<WG1161> believing<WG4100>, ye rejoice<WG21> with joy<WG5479> unspeakable<WG412> and<WG2532> full of glory<WG1392>:
Receiving<WG2865> the end<WG5056> of your<WG5216> faith<WG4102>, even the salvation<WG4991> of your souls<WG5590>.

Of<WG4012> which<WG3739> salvation<WG4991> the prophets<WG4396> have enquired<WG1567> and<WG2532> searched diligently<WG1830>, who<WG3588> prophesied<WG4395> of<WG4012> the grace<WG5485> that should come unto<WG1519> you<WG5209>:

Searching<WG2045> what<WG1519> <WG5101>, or<WG2228> what manner<WG4169> of time<WG2540> the Spirit<WG4151> of Christ<WG5547> which<WG3588> was in<WG1722> them<WG846> did signify<WG1213>, when it testified beforehand<WG4303> the sufferings<WG3804> of<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> the glory<WG1391> that should follow<WG3326> <WG5023>.

Unto whom<WG3739> it was revealed<WG601>, that<WG3754> not<WG3756> unto themselves<WG1438>, but<WG1161> unto us<WG2254> they did minister<WG1247> the things<WG846>, which<WG3739> are<WG312> now<WG3568> reported<WG312> unto you<WG5213> by<WG1223> them that have preached the gospel<WG2097> unto you<WG5209> with<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> sent down<WG649> from<WG575> heaven<WG3772>; which things<WG3739> the angels<WG32> desire<WG1937> to look<WG3879> into<WG1519>.

Wherefore<WG1352> gird up<WG328> the loins<WG3751> of your<WG5216> mind<WG1271>, be sober<WG3525>, and hope<WG1679> to the end<WG5049> for<WG1909> the grace<WG5485> that is to be brought<WG5342> unto you<WG5213> at<WG1722> the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>; to the end: Gr. perfectly
As<WG5613> obedient<WG5218> children<WG5043>, not<WG3361> fashioning yourselves according to<WG4964> the former<WG4386> lusts<WG1939> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> ignorance<WG52>:
But<WG235> as<WG2596> he which hath called<WG2564> you<WG5209> is holy<WG40>, so<WG2532> be<WG1096> ye<WG846> holy<WG40> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> manner of conversation<WG391>;
Because<WG1360> it is written<WG1125>, Be ye<WG1096> holy<WG40>; for<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> holy<WG40>.

And<WG2532> if<WG1487> ye call on<WG1941> the Father<WG3962>, who<WG3588> without respect of persons<WG678> judgeth<WG2919> according to<WG2596> every man's<WG1538> work<WG2041>, pass<WG390> the time<WG5550> of your<WG5216> sojourning<WG3940> here in<WG1722> fear<WG5401>:

Forasmuch as ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> ye were<WG3084> not<WG3756> redeemed<WG3084> with corruptible things<WG5349>, as silver<WG694> and<WG2228> gold<WG5553>, from<WG1537> your<WG5216> vain<WG3152> conversation<WG391> received by tradition from your fathers<WG3970>;
But<WG235> with the precious<WG5093> blood<WG129> of Christ<WG5547>, as<WG5613> of a lamb<WG286> without blemish<WG299> and<WG2532> without spot<WG784>:

Who verily<WG3303> was foreordained<WG4267> before<WG4253> the foundation<WG2602> of the world<WG2889>, but<WG1161> was manifest<WG5319> in<WG1909> these last<WG2078> times<WG5550> for<WG1223> you<WG5209>,

Who<WG3588> by<WG1223> him<WG846> do believe<WG4100> in<WG1519> God<WG2316>, that raised<WG1453> him<WG846> up<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> him<WG846> glory<WG1391>; that<WG5620> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> hope<WG1680> might be<WG1511> in<WG1519> God<WG2316>.

Seeing ye have purified<WG48> your<WG5216> souls<WG5590> in<WG1722> obeying<WG5218> the truth<WG225> through<WG1223> the Spirit<WG4151> unto<WG1519> unfeigned<WG505> love of the brethren<WG5360>, see that ye love<WG25> one another<WG240> with<WG1537> a pure<WG2513> heart<WG2588> fervently<WG1619>:

Being born again<WG313>, not<WG3756> of<WG1537> corruptible<WG5349> seed<WG4701>, but<WG235> of incorruptible<WG862>, by<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>, which liveth<WG2198> and<WG2532> abideth<WG3306> for<WG1519> ever<WG165>.

For<WG1360> all<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> is as<WG5613> grass<WG5528>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the glory<WG1391> of man<WG444> as<WG5613> the flower<WG438> of grass<WG5528>. The grass<WG5528> withereth<WG3583>, and<WG2532> the flower<WG438> thereof<WG846> falleth away<WG1601>: For: or, For that

But<WG1161> the word<WG4487> of the Lord<WG2962> endureth<WG3306> for<WG1519> ever<WG165>. And<WG1161> this<WG5124> is<WG2076> the word<WG4487> which<WG3588> by the gospel is preached<WG2097> unto<WG1519> you<WG5209>.
